Career Profile

A polyglot Senior Software Engineer with over 15 years experience, working in diversified markets as Automotive, Online Gambling and Health Care.

Currently working for BMW as a Team and Technical Lead, helping to design, implement, test and deploy solutions for autonomous driving car projects. Always with a focus on using the best practices in development and with a DevOps mindset, as adopting Agile Methodologies, Continuous Integration and Deployment, Test Driven Design and Infrastructure as Code.

Deep and broad understanding in designing and developing robust, scalable and high-performance microservices using core Java, Spring Boot and Cloud Computing Solutions.

I am a very proactive type of person, highly motivated and interested in both personal and professional development through continuous learning as well as coaching other engineers and building a strong team culture.

Experiences

Senior Software Enginner - Contract Position

June 2019 - March 2020 | London, UK
Kindred Group, Online Gambling Industry

TBC TBC TBC!!!!

After previously working for Kindred, I was offered a contract position in the Digital Marketing team to support and build new tools used to help acquire and retain online gambling users. The role was mostly decoupling a monolith application called Campaign System into microservices and work in new greenfield projects. It included defining the architecture and defining the delivery process to ensure we deliver high-quality software on time.

  • Proposing, documenting and implementing architectural solutions as part of breaking a monolith into microservices and adding new features using a microservices architecture.

  • Working closely with the architectures while identifying potential solutions for new business requests. All proposed architecture designs follow the C4 model, Domain-Driven Design and a Hexagonal architecture (Port and Adaptors). All these proposals were successful signed off and translated into code. This allows us to build loose coupling, high cohesion and highly scalable microservices.

  • Using Spring Cloud, PubSub+

  • Mentoring and coaching, supporting team members and advising the team on new tools and frameworks. Some examples the use of Spring State Machine, Lombok vs AutoValue, AssertJ

technologies

Java 11, Spring Framework (Boot, Cloud, JDBC, State Machine), Microservices architectures and patterns, Relational databases and SQL, RESTful Services and design, Message-driven architecture, PubSub+, DDD, Docker, K8s, Unit Testing Frameworks, Git, Maven

  • Team Lead and part of the autonomous driving car project.

Responsible to automate end-to-end business processes and software processes, applying Continuous Integration and Delivery, Infrastructure as Code, automating whenever possible to speed up the time to market while avoiding errors.
